title: More Than Words
overview: Innocent days are filled with kindness, at times with bitterness, but are always brimming with light. Mieko and Makio are friends in high school who befriend Eiji, a college student who works with them. Eiji and Makio fall in love, Mieko gives birth to their child, and Makio encounters his old childhood friend Asato. This is a story of youth and their beautiful yet bitter experiences.
